document_data.caption: A map showing Assundath in southeast Halruaa.
document_data.name: Assundath
document_data.mainbody: '''Assundath''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Assundath was a coastal town located in southeast Halruaa in the shadow of the [[Muaraghal Mountains]]. The town was located on the eastern side of the [[Bay of Azuth]] where it met the [[Great Sea]].
